title: Books for Blocks
description: Find a way to convert independent literature into non-fungible tokens on Cardano MainNet to support the creatives in the community.

title: Add SDG ratings to proposals - AIM
description: Partnering with UN Orgs means Cardano should adopt a common international framework & language of goal setting. This is currently absent.

title: WottleNFT: SDGs Driven NFT Auction
description: How can Cardano align their values with the UN Sustainable Development Goals?

title: Partnership for De-Fi Adoption
description: Lack of collaboration between government regulators and the Cardano Foundation to drive mass adoption.

title: Cardano Powering Planet Improvement
description: We need to create a **partnership of equals**, mass adoption will come from a respected **crypto-funded NPO/NGO** that helps the world improve!

title: Almagua DAO
description: The strategies of the industries to adapt to global warming of 1.5 ° C are the management of water and cooling, but they are not enough.

title: Rapid prototyping ...made easy
description: There are no platform that puts the Maker in the front seat around their ideas, or what a product have been used for after it is sold.

title: Tokenised crypto events (ICWT)
description: We came to the conclusion that most of the events related to crypto are very costly and highly overvalued.

title: Research in Applying Frameworks-AIM
description: How exactly Cardano can enter into global partnerships must be better understood. Without data decision making is difficult/near impossible.

title: Research dApp
description: Crypto is seen as merely a speculative vehicle, and its potential for research purposes and policy impact assessment has not been showcased.

title: Involve more gov. & UN officials
description: Governments & UN official have too few occasions to hear about Cardano.  How can we convince them that the millennium goals can be solved ?

title: The Roadmap Revisited
description: CF must establish global partnerships with the UN, World Bank, establish 130 Local Community Centers with $30K, and engage with Catalyst.

title: Endangered Language Preservation
description: Language is a cultural artifact, it is one's identity, and languages face extinction if not preserved.
